alert.note: Alert for Burnet (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:39PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LLANO AND NORTHWESTERN BURNET COUNTIES... At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tow, or 11 miles north of Buchanan Dam, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Buchanan Dam, Buchanan Lake Village, Lake Victor, Inks Lake State Park, Sunnylane, Bluffton, Tow and Longhorn Cavern State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
